subtitle: Practical quantum computing use cases for business leaders

slides.title: Quantum Use Cases
slides.subtitle: Practical quantum computing use cases for business leaders

slides.heading: The Problem
slides.statement: Business leaders can't evaluate quantum computing for their organizations
points: Quantum computing research is locked in academic papers — inaccessible to decision-makers
Vendor hype makes it impossible to separate real applications from marketing
No platform organizes use cases by industry, maturity, and business impact
Technical complexity prevents strategic planning for quantum readiness

slides.heading: The Solution
slides.statement: A curated platform that translates quantum research into actionable business intelligence
points: 10 cataloged use cases organized by industry, problem type, and maturity level
Side-by-side comparison of up to 3 use cases for strategic evaluation
Progressive learning paths — 3 stages from beginner to advanced
Bilingual EN/AR — including Quantum Sovereignty in the Arab World editorial

features.title: 10 Use Cases
features.description: Cataloged by industry, maturity, and impact

features.title: Side-by-Side Compare
features.description: Compare up to 3 use cases simultaneously

features.title: Bilingual EN/AR
features.description: Full Arabic support with RTL layout

timeline.milestone: Platform launched — 10 use cases, comparison tool, learning paths
Quantum Sovereignty editorial — Arab world perspective
Expanded to 25 use cases with industry partnerships
Enterprise assessment tool — quantum readiness scoring

slides.heading: Vision
slides.statement: Become the definitive resource for quantum computing business strategy
milestones: 2026: 25 use cases + enterprise assessment tool — 5,000 users
2028: Arab quantum computing initiative — regional leadership
2030: The standard platform for quantum strategy — 50,000+ users
